Start off with installing `tmux` with homebrew on Mac.

```{.sh}
brew install tmux
```

<style>
  #fig-tmux {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .session {
    position: absolute;
    border: 2px solid black;
    width: fit-content;
    background: #eee;
  }

  .session-1 {
    transform: translate(10, 10);
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .session-2 {
    transform: translate(20, 20);
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .window {
    border: 1px solid black;
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 10px;
    width: fit-content;
    background: #fff;
  }
